Auto Messenger Message group: Delay: 20 10 30 Random order: Minimum: Maximum: Random delay: Infinite repeat: Basic settings Advanced settings Tutorial Remove ads Rate app Share app Credits Privacy policy Do you like quizzes? Group name: Save Some error occurred Instructions Group list Attention! Click OK to delete this message group: Almost there! Type your messages. Name your message group. Instructions Skip line to represent the end of a message, as in example bellow:

First message
Second message
Third message Attention To record keyboard coordinates, drag the target to the symbol corresponding to the one requested by the table above. Ready Registered coordinates! Record the coordinate corresponding to Caps Lock. Write the coordinate related to special characters (!#1 or ?123). Write the coordinate corresponding to the spacebar. Click CAPS LOCK. Click !#1 or ?123 Click spacebar Caps Lock !#1 or ?123 Space Bar Register the coordinate corresponding to the sending of messages and the coordinate corresponding to the writing field. Auto Messenger will only work if these coordinates are registered. It is recommended to watch the tutorial. Click OK to continue. Drag the target to the coordinate corresponding to sending messages. she is at the keyboard. Drag the target into the writing field. The keyboard must be closed. Registered coordinate Others Enable Disable Tutorials Remove adds Version 2.1.0 Please enable accessibility permission for the Auto Messenger perform automated click gestures.

No personal information is collected by Auto Messenger. Auto Messenger Coordinates Enable Auto Messenger Start Abort Warning Enable accessibility permission for the Auto Messenger perform automated click gestures. Enable draw over other apps permission so that Auto Messenger can act.
Almost there! Your messages are not set up yet! Your coordinates are not set yet! The delay must be within the range of 1 second to 300 seconds. The maximum delay must be greater than the minimum delay. Configure the coordinate corresponding to sending messages. Click the related button on the action bar and configure it. Set the coordinate corresponding to the writing field. Click the related button on the action bar and configure it.
Make sure your backlight duration is set with enough time for Auto Messenger to work. Click OK to continue.

AccessibilityService The main feature of this app use the Accessibility Service API to simulate clicks. 

1. Why does this app need to use the Accessibility Services API?
We use this method to simulate click.

 2. Does this app collect and/or share personal or sensitive data using the accessibility capabilities?
No user's personal information is collected.

 If you agree to use it, click on Agree. I agree I disagree
Unlock access To continue using Auto Messenger you need to have more than XP in the My Quiz app. Unlock I already have Type your email registered in My Quiz app to check your score. Check Successfully unlocked! Error An error has occurred. Check your internet connection or wait a few moments. Checking... Invalid email. You do not have enough XP in My Quiz. Play more!
